group_1.textLeft: So I checked the neighbor's house...
It's not a Miss Rei who lives there,@but a Mister...
The nameplate is clearly engraved@with "Zeroro."

group_1.textRight: I wonder what his brother is named, then? One?
Whatever the case, it's a man, so it has nothing@to do with the voice of the woman named Rei-chan.
Fumuuu...
I'm so exhausted...

group_1.textLeft: You all may rest up here.
I'm going back to my house to retrieve@a bag for the ornaments.

group_1.textRight: Thanks...

group_1.textLeft: What theãƒ¼?!

group_1.textRight: [chara:113702:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Nayutan?!
What's happening?!
...That's - oh!

group_1.textLeft: I found - I found an ornament lying here...

group_1.textRight: B-but the one you're holding@right now...
...it's shining in a completely different@direction.
So this ornament is not the one...
...that was supposed to be found@after the one that's glowing now,
But rather, it's one that was intended@to be found much later in the sequence?

group_1.textLeft: And we came across it by accident...with@our own eyes, rather than using the light?

group_1.textRight: Does that mean we cheated?!
That appears to be the case,@and its location is...

group_1.textLeft: In front of my house... More specifically,@at my front door...

group_1.textRight: What should we do?

group_1.textLeft: ...We may as well touch it.

group_1.narration: I would like to express my sincere gratitude@to all of you for each and every one of your votes@that have allowed me to be involved in the@Kamihama City Government for three terms.

I will continue to put all of my past experiences@to good use in making a town where everyone@can be happy to live, from our newest ward Shinsei@to every corner in the ancient ward of Daito -@and also in creating a town without inequity.
"This is the house she was talking about...@[textRed:Nayuta Satomi's] home..."
"I know it's unforgivable,@but I'll leave the gift here for her."

group_1.textLeft: [chara:113701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]*Gasp*

group_1.textRight: She said Nayutan's name so clearly...
Fumuuu...?

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what does this indicate...?

group_1.textRight: ...What's this?
The campaign car I heard on the way was the same@one that can be heard around the city right now,
which is to say, it's the same one the voice's owner@heard today when she left her present at this door...
Yes, I'm certain of that.

group_1.textLeft: I think this voice is coming from the mother@of the family we've been hearing.
I think she's older now - an old woman,@in fact - but still...

group_1.textRight: I guess that's how long it's been.
This was from just before she placed down@the presents...
So in the original order, this would be@the most recent memory.

group_1.textLeft: In other words, in the time that passed@between the last voice and the first one,
Rei-chan's young mother became an old lady...
So this history we have been tracing@spans the course of decades...?

group_1.textRight: This is a way bigger story than I thought!

group_1.textLeft: B-but that's not the only surprise@that's blindsided me...
The old lady said she was going to@drop off the present here.

group_1.textRight: Oh, I get it...!
Fu, fumu...fumumufumumu@fuuumumumu.

group_1.textLeft: So the voice from this family that@we had assumed to be the recipient was,
in fact...the voice of the [textRed:giver]?

group_1.textRight: And that giver...
...placed it here knowing that@Miss Satomi lives here.
So the gift that we thought had been@delivered to the wrong address,
was, in truth, delivered to the right one...
That is to say, to Nayuta Satomi's house.

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what's going on...?
